key.name: enabled
key.description: When enabled, Cronopete will do backups periodically.

key.name: visible
key.description: When enabled, an icon with the current status will be shown in the menu bar.

key.name: skip-hiden-at-home
key.summary: Don't backup the hidden files in the personal folder
key.description: When enabled, hidden files and folders in the root of the personal folder won't be backed up (but hidden files and folders in subdirectories will be).

key.name: backup-uid
key.description: UID of the partition where to do the backups.

key.name: backup-path
key.description: Path to the location where the external disk is mounted.

key.name: backup-folders
key.description: List of folders to be backed up.

key.name: exclude-folders
key.description: These folders won't be backed up, even if they are inside a folder that will be backed up.

key.name: all-drives
key.description: Allows to choose an internal or non-removable drive for backups (only recommended for testing).

key.name: toning-color
key.description: This color will be used when entering in the Restoring backups interface, for toning the background picture

key.name: show-welcome
key.description: When enabled, Cronopete will show the welcome message asking the user to configure the backups.
